Correlation¶

This modules collect all those functions that are necessary to correlate seismic traces. It is possible to fully exploit multicore CPU capability working in parallel. The base structure that collects the traces that must be correlated can be chosen between Stream or classic numpy ndarray array.

@author: Eraldo Pomponi

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

Created on Nov 25, 2010

BlockCanvas oriented¶

corr_trace_fun Correlate Traces according to the given combinations
norm_corr_stream Normalization of the correlation traces to the selected unit_measure

Basic¶

conv_traces Convolve two Traces and merge their meta-information

Helper functions¶

extend Extend the 1D numpy array x beyond its original length
merge_id Create a SEED like id for an ObsPy Trace object that stores corr data
combine_stats Combine the meta-information of two ObsPy Trace objects
